Medlay

Hybrid Media Form Concept

Table of Content

I am writing these notes to introduce and formalize a new concept for crafting multimedia artefacts on the Web — Medlay — in hopes of providing some interesting food for thought and pushing the boundaries of the practice further.

    Voices, Noises and Musics

  • Research
    Hybridization of Cinema and Comics
  • What is Next?
    Looking to the Future

The notes are a work in progress, thus they are potentially filled up with plenty of unfinished thoughts, grammar mistakes1 and much more. If you feel you have something2 to say and/or spot something worth fixing, please submit an issue on GitHub: many many thanks!

  1. And I bet there are plenty, since English it’s not my native language. ↩

  2. Thoughts, critiques, suggestions, … are more than welcomed! ↩
